channel.title: response on Holmquist

item.title: my GET vs. POST blog post
item.description: GET vs. POST and REST APIs Over the past month, I have worked on building web applications using node and express. You can check out the repo here :coffee: My goal has to been to learn more about full-stack development and deepen my understanding on APIs, databases, and Node.js. I skirted around with tutorials and small projects that involve (usually) front-end but have never bothered to connect any back-end with it.
